name: Anubis
description: Anubis is our youngest king. He’s a gorgeous Seal Bicolor and comes from the cattery Elevage De Nos Amis Félins. He has very sweet and friendly personality, which is a trait he commonly passes down on his kittens. A winner of multiple exhibition shows, he is a stunning Birman king with great genes.

name: Seti
description: Seti is the oldest of our kings (but still in his prime! Nobody dare to call him old!), who we welcomed from the cattery Des Souffleurs. He is a Blue Bicolor, the only one among our cats. He’s a proud king, carrying himself with grace and dignity even when nobody is watching, knowing just how handsome he is. He is not the one to play, but he is quite affectionate.

name: Rama
description: Rama is our Blue Point Mitted king from the Chatterie du Mas La Fontaine. The goofiest of the bunch, he’s very energetic and loves to play. He’s also the fluffiest, having a very long and luscious coat that would be probably enough for two cats. Rama is a very friendly cat that goes along with almost everyone and he loves company, the bigger the better.

name: Amunet
description: Amunet is a sweet young cat from the Chatterie de Toisley. She is a very pretty Seal Bicolor Birman. Amunet is a very loving, gentle and affectionate cat. She loves to cuddle with her fellow cat friends and is a kind and attentive mother to her kittens. She doesn’t like too much of chaos, therefore she tends to avoid Rama whenever he’s being particularly energetic.

name: Manon
description: Manon is our stunning Lilac Pointed Lynx queen from the cattery Birmans des Quatre Vallées. A cat of rare coat with beautiful looks and sweet personality, and a winner of many shows, she is our most prized queen. Manon is a kind, gentle and serene cat that loves to be loved. She especially loves kittens and often helps raise kittens of other queens, especially Morrigan’s, who she is bonded with.

name: Morrigan
description: Morrigan is our four years old queen that was born in our cattery to a retired queen and Seti. She’s a Blue Point Birman and remained in the cattery due to her high potential for being a queen - superb looks and great personality. And indeed, she is a great queen and mothered several great litters. She is bonded with Manon and hates to be apart from her - you’ll rarely find them not cuddling or playing together.

name: Rhiannon
description: Rhiannon is the newest addition to our kingdom, an established queen from the cattery Du Pays D’Or. She is a Chocolate Bicolor, the only one of her kind in our cattery. At four years old, she already proved herself as a queen in her former cattery, and we hope that she will bring beautiful Chocolate kittens to us as well. She is kind and affectionate, and gets along well with others, despite her recent arrival.

name: Regina
description: Regina is a queen born in our cattery to Morrigan and an outside king. She is a beautiful Seal Point cat with deep coloration. Regina is very affectionate towards humans, but she isn’t terribly fond of most of the other cats, except for Amunet and Seti. Therefore, she prefers to spend her time alone or with humans. She is a great mother though, deeply caring for both her kittens and other kittens in the cattery.

name: Sisi
Cattery: Chatterie de la Roche des Dieux
description: Sisi is our Chocolate Point Mitted cat, until recently the only Chocolate Birman in the kingdom, that came to us from the Chatterie de la Roche des Dieux. She has a unique face marking and orange fade to her color, which makes her quite special. She has a great personality - sweet, friendly, cuddly and playful - the best combination. Sisi is also a very curious, highly impressionable cat, which Rama likes to take an advantage of to get her to become his mischief accomplice.

name: Cadeyrn
description: Cadeyrn is a Seal point male from the litter C of Amunet and Rama.His name means 'battle king' in Welsh and it certainly fits. He's very brave and is the first one to explore new things, climb high or investigate the danger. He's not the most social kitten, but loves cuddles.

name: Cairo
description: Cairo is the only Blue kitten in the litter and the biggest sweetheart. He has a very friendly and cuddly personality, to the point he’s actually quite clingy. The ultimate lap cat, the tiniest of distance between him and his siblings or an owner is a distance way too long. Prepare to never be alone again, as Cairo will try his best to keep you a very fluffy company 24/7, and disregard all your complaints in the process.

name: Cleopatra
description:
Cleopatra is a Seal point Bicolor female from litter C of Regina and Rama.
She is the princess of the litter, knowing exactly how to use her cuteness to get her extra treats and cuddles.
Cleo is very affectionate and once she decides your her human, she's never letting you out of her sight.
